wordageddon.service

Class DocumentServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.service.DocumentServices

  • public class DocumentServices
extends java.lang.Object
    Unified service for document management, processing and persistence. Combines the functionality of AdminDocumentService, DocumentProcessingTask, and DocumentTermMatrixPersistenceService.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca

      Constructs a new DocumentServices with initialized components.

        public boolean loadDocumentFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads a new document from file and adds it to the collection.

        filePath - path to the document file
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • regenerateAndSaveDtm

        public void regenerateAndSaveDtm()
        Forces regeneration of the Document Term Matrix and saves the game data. To be called from the admin panel.

      • createDocumentProcessingTask

        public <any> createDocumentProcessingTask(DocumentTermMatrix dtm,
                                          java.io.File documentFile)
        Creates a task for processing a single document asynchronously. This is used to avoid blocking the UI thread during document processing.
        Parameters:
        dtm - the Document-Term Matrix to populate
        documentFile - the file to process
        Returns:
        a JavaFX Task for async processing

      • createPersistenceService

        public <any> createPersistenceService(DocumentTermMatrix dtm,
                                      java.lang.String filePath,
                                      boolean isLoadOperation)
        Creates a service for saving or loading DTM in background. Provides asynchronous operations for document term matrix persistence.
        Parameters:
        dtm - the DTM to save, or null if loading
        filePath - the file path for save/load operation
        isLoadOperation - true if loading, false if saving
        Returns:
        a JavaFX Service that performs the operation
